This game is a classic and for the most part has remained popular and maintained a decent sized player base ever since its release in 11/8/2000. Never gets old, I've been playing since it first came out and have over 4,500 hours of playtime logged. The day that people stop playing this game is going to be a sad day..A sad day indeed..
